about_the_game:
During a late night of wandering your local Big Maple Retailer store for some random nick nacks you find that the exit is no where to be seen. Taking matters into your own hand you wander further, thinking it must not be far away, but this ends up with more confusion. This is not the store you once knew... The rooms don't make sense, turns that shouldn't exist, distances that are just wrong, and items... items with weird properties.

For surviving you found that stealing doesn't work, every time you reached with the intent to steal a wall of dread would fill your mind.
Buying stuff is a viable option and the only way to buy things is to obtain money by working.

Work your new job and contribute your time to the stores infrastructure.
Manage your given tasks, delivering items to specific places while also doing more time sensitive tasks. Plan your moves so you can get more done in less time.

Uncover what this place really is, and find a way out... hopefully... cause you keep discovering signs of life that have been trapped here for a long long time... if time is even a concept here as well...
detailed_description:
During a late night of wandering your local Big Maple Retailer store for some random nick nacks you find that the exit is no where to be seen. Taking matters into your own hand you wander further, thinking it must not be far away, but this ends up with more confusion. This is not the store you once knew... The rooms don't make sense, turns that shouldn't exist, distances that are just wrong, and items... items with weird properties.

For surviving you found that stealing doesn't work, every time you reached with the intent to steal a wall of dread would fill your mind.
Buying stuff is a viable option and the only way to buy things is to obtain money by working.

Work your new job and contribute your time to the stores infrastructure.
Manage your given tasks, delivering items to specific places while also doing more time sensitive tasks. Plan your moves so you can get more done in less time.

Uncover what this place really is, and find a way out... hopefully... cause you keep discovering signs of life that have been trapped here for a long long time... if time is even a concept here as well...
name: Big Maple Retailer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500, or maybe anything with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The forced retail experience. Manage your time sensitive tasks and inventory in this infinite Retailer. Explore the many secrets and try to understand this new environment. Gain money to fund your expeditions to find an exit... any exit, before you succumb to your new life.
